name: Terminux
description:
This game is made for Santa Jam 2022. The theme was about viruses.

How to play

  • W A S D for movement
  • Left-click to shoot
  • Right-click to use skill
  • Left-shift to dash
  • Every time the progress bar is filled (by shooting at enemies!), you can choose an upgrade, and the main obstacle is to kill Terminux - the final boss.

This game may occurs some errors but in overall, it has been wrapped up.  (may have some updates if needed).

Any feedbacks about the game, please drop a comment. I would be more than happy to read them!
